snippet: BLUMBERG--Mayrose (nee Kantrowitz), age 92, passed away on Friday, March 11, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Harold Blumberg, devoted mother of Barbara and Howard, proud grandmother of Amanda. Mayrose was an artist and teacher. Memorial donations may be made to Hunter College, New York City. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLUMBERG--Mayrose (nee Kantrowitz), age 92, passed away on Friday, March 11, 2016. Memorial donations may be made to Hunter College, New York City. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLUMBERG, MAYROSE (NEE KANTROWITZ)
